articles.title: Former Olympic volleyball player, silver medalist Kim Glass attacked in Los Angeles, suffered multiple bone fractures in face
articles.description: Former Olympic volleyball silver medalist Kim Glass was attacked Friday night in Los Angeles by a man who threw a metal object at her face, fracturing multiple bones and causing her left eye to swell shut.

articles.description: Executive vice president/general manager Joe Sakic has been named the Avalanche's president of hockey operations, clearing the way for assistant GM Chris MacFarland to take over as the fifth general manager in Colorado team history.
